body.p: The Board found these comments persuasive. Therefore it decided that the Standard should not apply to the measurement of inventories of:

li.p: producers of agricultural and forest products, agricultural produce after harvest, and minerals and mineral products, to the extent that they are measured at net realisable value (as in the previous version of IAS 2), or
commodity broker‑traders when their inventories are measured at fair value less costs to sell.
